name: NoNaMeGaMe
description:
The gameplay is a elimination game,i made some  modification to the rules,you can find them in MODE2,they make the game more like a strategy game(maybe).Hope they are interesting for you.

And i'm still learning unity ,this an exercise project as well.But i think the completion degree is not bad, so i upload it though there many problem in it.

Enjoy it ! ! ^_^
